responses: Regular Intake / Regular ELigibility / B.Tech (CS) Syllabus / Admission Process

Regular Eligibility Criteria : i. Urdu as a subject/language or as a Medium in 10th/12th level or equivalent Madrasa courses with Urdu as medium of Instruction approvedby MANUU.  ii.Passed 10+2 examination with Physics, Mathematics and for remainingsingle course select any course out of the following:Chemistry/ Computer Science/Electronics/Information Technology/ Biology/ Informatics Practices/ Biotechnology/ Technical Vocational subject/ Agriculture/ Engineering Graphics/ Business Studies/Entrepreneurship and Obtained at least 45% marks (40%marks incase of candidates belonging to reserved category) in the above subjects taken together. OR Passed min. 3 years Diploma examination with at least 45%marks (40%marks in case of candidates belonging to reserved category) subject tovacancies in the First Year, in case the vacancies at lateral entry areexhausted.

B.Tech (CS) Admission Process : Entrance Based(ET)  /  Last date for Submission of filled-in Application Forms,28th May, 2023  /  Form open for Editing for ET based programme,7th and 8th June, 2023  /  Issue of Admit Card for ET based programme,12th June, 2023  /  Dates of ET Exams,20th, 21st and 22nd June, 2023  /  Application cum Registration Fee ET Based  /  Exam Center

intents.tag: Application cum Registration Fee ET Based
responses: Fee Payment through Online Mode only  /  General Category Candidates:Rs. 550.00  /  SC/ST/PWD/OBC(Non-creamy Layer)/Women Candidates:Rs. 350.00   /  Foreign students:Rs. 2500.00
